column5: even though the Colts are 5-1 favorites.....im going to predict   Saints 30.... Colts 24
Have to go Colts 31 -21 Colts have a very underestimated defence, which I see as the only main dif between these two teams.
I would love to see the underdog saints win their first super bowl.  Saints 28 Colts 17
Colts in a romp, most likely going to be over by the time the WHO start playin.  Take this for what it's worth, I'm a Detroit Lions fan.  Clarence.
what is a superbowl? an eating contest?
A lot of beer will be drunk today
Would love to see the Saints win but the Colts are probably too well rounded.
superbore..... but my wife likes the half-time COMMERCIALS
I'm a  Cowboys fan.  Dallas beat New Orleans.  The Colts will win and cover.

I'll have to take the colts primarily because of Manning. Though their pass protection had better be on point. I suspect you'll see a bit less spread and they will keep a back or 2 in the backfield to pick up the blitz packages tossed at them by Greg Williams.   Saints running game (with Bush) plays into the speed of the front 7 for Indy, downhill runners give the colts more problems.   Colts 34 Saints 27   I also believe I will be challenging Drifter as the most northern contingent from OFC during the game....either Igloolik or Iqaluit depending on the weather.
I predict the highest SB score to date. don't expect much defence in this one  Ed Reed put the Colts here and the refs put the Saints in.
I love underdogs.....C' MON SAINTS!!@!!!
COOOOOOOOOOOOOOLTS!  i don't predict scores cause i usually mess that up......... lol.

The Saints are lucky to have beaten the Viking in overtime and only because of 5 Minnesota turnovers. Take those turnovers away and the Saints would have been blown out at home.....  Colts 38 Vikings 21

Colts take this one real easy, Payton is just too good.  It'll take him a quarter to figure out the defense and then he'll pick em apart.  I'm actually looking forward to this superbowl, I think it'll be a good high scoring game  Time to go score some Keith's red
For the people of New Orleans, I want the Saints to win their first Super Bowl, them people been through alot in the last few years.
I think it's just a fat man's intestine - misspelled.  JF
So will a lot of fans.  JF
Mmmm, nothing like the taste of your own words in the morning...Good thing I didn't put any money on that.
Bassdreamer wins........off by a field goal
yes bass dreamer is the closest....must have some crystal balls or something ....all in all.... it wasnt a bad game for a superbowl....
What do i win !!!! :clapping:lol. That was one lucky guess,I'm a diehard steelers fan,and i like to see different teams win the superbowl when the steelers ain't in it !
you win the right to try and guess the outcome for some Olympic competitions  ...polish up those crystal balls
Sorry to say this :i don't think canada will win the hockey gold ! Hope i'm wrong !
